languages.text: "Помнишь ли ты песнь, что помог{mf||ла} сложить в битве с Криком скверны? Стылая печаль была в каждой ее строфе. Тогда я, должно быть, впервые узрел уготованный мне путь".

"Do you remember the verse you helped me compose in the battle with Doomscream? Icy sorrow rang in every line of it. That was when, I think, I first understood the path that had been laid out for me."
languages.original_text: "Помнишь ли ты песнь, что помог{mf||ла} сложить в битве с Криком скверны? Стылая печаль была в каждой ее строфе. Тогда я, должно быть, впервые узрел уготованный мне путь".

traits.locale_text: "Do you remember the song you helped me compose in the battle with Balescream? Icy sorrow rang in every line of it. That was when, I think, I first understood the path that had been laid out for me."
"Do you remember the song you helped me compose in the battle with Balescream? Icy sorrow rang in every line of it. That was when, I think, I first understood the path that had been laid out for me."
"Do you remember the song you helped me compose in the battle with Balescream? Icy sorrow rang in every line of it. That was when, I think, I first understood the path that had been laid out for me."

"Do you remember the verse you helped me compose in the battle with Doomscream? Icy sorrow rang in every line of it. That was when, I think, I first understood the path that had been laid out for me."

languages.text: «¿Recuerda el verso que me ayudó a componer en la batalla con Doomscream? Un gélido pesar resonaba en cada verso. Creo que fue entonces cuando empecé a entender el camino que me estaba preparado».
languages.original_text: "Do you remember the verse you helped me compose in the battle with Doomscream? Icy sorrow rang in every line of it. That was when, I think, I first understood the path that had been laid out for me."

traits.locale_text: «¿Recuerda la canción que me ayudó a componer en la batalla con Balescream? Un gélido pesar resonaba en cada verso. Creo que fue entonces cuando empecé a entender el camino que me estaba preparado».

languages.text: “你还记得我们与灾啸的那种战斗中，你帮我谱写的那首歌吗？每句歌词都带着冰冷的悲伤。我想，就是那个时候，我第一次明白了自己的路该怎么走。”
languages.original_text: "Do you remember the verse you helped me compose in the battle with Doomscream? Icy sorrow rang in every line of it. That was when, I think, I first understood the path that had been laid out for me."

traits.locale_text: “你还记得我们与灾啸的那种战斗中，你帮我谱写的那首歌吗？每句歌词都带着冰冷的悲伤。我想，就是那个时候，我第一次明白了自己的路该怎么走。”

languages.text: 「ドゥームスクリームとの戦いであんたが作るのを手伝ってくれた詞を覚えているか？その曲のすべての行に氷のような悲しみが響き渡った。その時、俺は自分に定められた道を初めて理解したように思う」
languages.original_text: "Do you remember the verse you helped me compose in the battle with Doomscream? Icy sorrow rang in every line of it. That was when, I think, I first understood the path that had been laid out for me."

traits.locale_text: 「ベイルスクリームとの戦いであんたが作るのを手伝ってくれた歌を覚えているか？その曲のすべての行に氷のような悲しみが響き渡った。その時、俺は自分に定められた道を初めて理解したように思う」

languages.text: « Vous vous souvenez du verset que vous m'avez aidé à composer lors de la bataille contre le Fléau Hurlant ? Chaque couplet était empreint d'un chagrin à vous glacer les sangs. Je crois que c'est à ce moment-là que j'ai compris la voie qui avait été tracée à mon attention. »
languages.original_text: "Do you remember the verse you helped me compose in the battle with Doomscream? Icy sorrow rang in every line of it. That was when, I think, I first understood the path that had been laid out for me."

traits.locale_text: « Vous vous souvenez de la chanson que vous m'avez aidé à composer lors de la bataille contre le Fléau Hurlant ? Chaque couplet était empreint d'un chagrin à vous glacer les sangs. Je crois que c'est à ce moment-là que j'ai compris la voie qui avait été tracée à mon attention. »

languages.text: "Erinnert Ihr Euch an den Vers, den Ihr mir im Kampf mit Unheilsschrei zu verfassen geholfen habt? Eisige Trauer durchzog jede einzelne Zeile. Ich glaube, da habe ich zum ersten Mal verstanden, welcher Weg mir vorbestimmt war."
languages.original_text: "Do you remember the verse you helped me compose in the battle with Doomscream? Icy sorrow rang in every line of it. That was when, I think, I first understood the path that had been laid out for me."

traits.locale_text: "Erinnert Ihr Euch an das Lied, das Ihr mir im Kampf mit Unheilsschrei zu komponieren geholfen habt? Eisige Trauer durchzog jede einzelne Zeile. Ich glaube, da habe ich zum ersten Mal verstanden, welcher Weg mir vorbestimmt war."

languages.original_text: "Do you remember the verse you helped me compose in the battle with Doomscream? Icy sorrow rang in every line of it. That was when, I think, I first understood the path that had been laid out for me."

languages.text: "Belanarası ile olan savaşta yazmama yardım ettiğin mısraları hatırlıyor musun? Soğuk bir kederle kaleme alınmışlardı. Önümde beni bekleyen yolun ilk kez o zaman farkına varmıştım sanırım."
languages.original_text: "Do you remember the verse you helped me compose in the battle with Doomscream? Icy sorrow rang in every line of it. That was when, I think, I first understood the path that had been laid out for me."

traits.locale_text: "Belanarası ile olan savaşta yazmama yardım ettiğin mısraları hatırlıyor musun? Hepsinde soğuk bir keder vardı. Önümde beni bekleyen yolun ilk kez o zaman farkına varmıştım sanırım."
